rows.label: qev025304_MSG0002
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I ran outta dough for the day, so all I've
got left are frozen pies. Only 1,000 credits, and just
as good as freshâ€”that's the Army Pizza guarantee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025304_SEL0011
rows.name: Purchase a frozen pizza for 1,000 credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025304_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Powell you aren't interested in frozen pizza.

rows.label: qev025304_MSG0003
rows.name:
Frozen or no, I put love into all my pies.
I guarantee the taste'll blow you away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025304_MSG0004
rows.name:
Sorry about that. If we were better staffed, I'd have
more time for baking. Come back next time and I'll fix
you up with a hot, fresh pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025304_MSG0005
rows.name:
...The hell? You tryin' to screw me here?!
Er, I mean...you appear to be short, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=ma'am ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025304_MSG0006
rows.name:
Sorry, but I don't run tabs. You want a pizza,
you gotta scrounge up the 1,000 credits in cash.[ST:wait ]
